title: Interview with Dr. Tess Bartlett
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr. Tess Bartlett from Monash University in Melbourne, Australia. Dr. Bartlett's work looks at a range of issues such as fathers, families, imprisonment, identity and masculinities. She explains about many of the issues men face in prison in regards to lack of support they receive as fathers or classes to aid their fatherhood skills.
